thread.title: Justin Trudeau to appoint new cabinet with equal gender balance
thread.title_full: Justin Trudeau to appoint new cabinet with equal gender balance

author: CBC News
title: Justin Trudeau to appoint new cabinet with equal gender balance
text: Justin Trudeau to appoint new cabinet with equal gender balance Trudeau to begin process of transitioning power CBC News Posted: Oct 20, 2015 4:26 PM ET Last Updated: Oct 20, 2015 5:28 PM ET Prime minister-designate Justin Trudeau speaks to supporters at a rally in Ottawa, Tuesday following his majority win the night before. (Adrian Wyld/Canadian Press) Related Stories
